scripts.start:android: yarn run clean && webpack --config webpack.android.js --mode development --watch
scripts.build:prod: yarn run clean && webpack --config webpack.android.js --mode production
scripts.build:dev: yarn run clean && webpack --config webpack.android.js --mode development
scripts.cleanjs: rimraf ./src/*.jsx.map & rimraf ./src/*.jsx & rimraf ./src/hooks/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/hooks/*.js &rimraf ./src/utils/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/utils/*.js & rimraf ./src/store/*/*.js & rimraf ./src/store/*/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/resources/*.jsx & rimraf ./src/resources/*.jsx.map & rimraf ./src/resources/*.js & rimraf ./src/resources/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/interfaces/*/*.js & rimraf ./src/interfaces/*/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/force/*.js & rimraf ./src/force/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/enums/*.js & rimraf ./src/enums/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/dataLayer/*.js & rimraf ./src/dataLayer/*.js.map & rimraf ./src/components/*.jsx & rimraf ./src/components/*.jsx.map & rimraf ./src/components/*/*.jsx & rimraf ./src/components/*/*/*/*.jsx & rimraf ./src/components/*/*/*/*.jsx.map  & rimraf ./src/components/*/*/*.jsx.map & rimraf ./src/components/*/*/*.jsx & rimraf ./src/components/*/*.jsx.map  & rimraf ./www/js/main.js & rimraf ./www/js/*main.js & rimraf ./www/js/*main.js.map & rimraf ./www/js/*hot-update.js & rimraf ./www/js/*hot-update.js.map & rimraf ./www/js/*hot-update.json & rimraf ./www/js/main.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*main.js & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*main.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*hot-update.js & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*hot-update.json & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*hot-update.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/main.js & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*main.js & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*main.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*hot-update.js & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*hot-update.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*hot-update.json
scripts.clean: rimraf ./www/js/main.js & rimraf ./www/js/*main.js & rimraf ./www/js/*main.js.map & rimraf ./www/js/*hot-update.js & rimraf ./www/js/*hot-update.js.map & rimraf ./www/js/*hot-update.json & rimraf ./www/js/main.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*main.js & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*main.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*hot-update.js & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*hot-update.json & rimraf ./platforms/browser/www/js/*hot-update.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/main.js & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*main.js & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*main.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*hot-update.js & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*hot-update.js.map & rimraf ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/js/*hot-update.json
